meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of ribozymes.
meanings.sent1: The ribozymal reaction was crucial for the cell.
meanings.sent2: Her ribozymal research led to groundbreaking discoveries.
meanings.sent3: The ribozymal molecules danced together in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent4: His ribozymal abilities were like a symphony of molecular music.
meanings.sent5: The ribozymal nature of the enzyme made it incredibly efficient.

meanings.sent3: The ribozymal behavior of the molecule was unexpectedly playful.
